'''Paul Daneman''' ([[29 October|October 29]], [[1925]] - [[28 April|April 28]], [[2001]]) was the voice of [[Bilbo Baggins]] in ''[[The Hobbit (1968 radio series)|The Hobbit]]'' radio adaptation broadcast on BBC Radio 4.
